original_text: This is the living creature that I saw under the God of Israel by the river of Chebar; and I knew that they were the cherubims.
korean_text: 그것은 내가 그발 강 가에서 보던 이스라엘의 하나님 아래에 있던 생물이라 그들이 그룹인 줄을 내가 아니라

sentences.original_text: that I saw under the God of Israel
and I knew that they were cherubims
